attributes.action: Fund all Healthcare for British people living in the Valencian region of Spain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the end of last year anyone that did not fall into certain categories have been denied the most basic right to healthcare in Valencia. Early retirees who do not have bottomless bank accounts but who have paid in to the British systen over their lifetimes now find themselves financially disadvantaged. We moved here under the surety the the Valencian Authority would provide healthcare in fact they encouraged people to move to boost their own economy see (puma22.org).
We demand the basic human right of access to healthcare  which is given freely to immigrants to Britain.
